Developer Terms of Use
des:
Are you looking after someone with dementia? Are you struggling to find answers to your questions? Then CogniCare is the solution for you. 

CogniCare is a personal guide for family and friends looking after someone with dementia. It will help you through the caring process and support you every step of the way. 

You can questions about the different types of dementia and what causes them. For example, what is Alzheimer’s disease? What causes Parkinson’s dementia? You can also ask about the different symptoms of dementia. You can ask what they are, what causes them, what you can do to help, what treatments are available, how to prevent them and how they impact daily life. 

Topics that are currently available include:
Aggression
Depression
Delusions
Hallucinations
Inappropriate sexual behaviour
Oral health
Refusal or resistive behaviour
Sleep

Coming soon: Wandering, memory loss and communication

Disclaimer: This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only. This tool is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
